001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.controller;
002
003import android.content.Intent;
004import android.view.View;
005import android.view.View.OnClickListener;
006import androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultLauncher;
007import androidx.activity.result.contract.ActivityResultContracts;
008import androidx.activity.result.contract.ActivityResultContracts.StartActivityForResult;
009import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
010import android.os.Bundle;
011import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
012import com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInAccount;
013import com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar;
014import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.R;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.databinding.ActivityLoginBinding;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.viewmodel.LoginViewModel;
018
019@AndroidEntryPoint
020public class LoginActivity extends AppCompatActivity {
021
022  private ActivityLoginBinding binding;
023  private LoginViewModel viewModel;
024  private ActivityResultLauncher <Intent> launcher;
025  private boolean silent;
026
027  @Override
028  protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
029    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
030    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(this).get(LoginViewModel.class);
031    getLifecycle().addObserver(viewModel);
032    launcher = registerForActivityResult(new StartActivityForResult(), viewModel::completeSignIn);
033    silent = true;
034    viewModel
035        .getAccount()
036        .observe(this, this::handleAccount);
037    viewModel
038        .getThrowable()
039        .observe(this, this::informFailure);
040  }
041
042  private void handleAccount(GoogleSignInAccount account){
043    if (account != null) {
044      Intent intent = new Intent(this, MainActivity.class)
045          .addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TASK | Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK);
046      startActivity(intent);
047    } else if (silent) {
048      silent = false;
049      binding = ActivityLoginBinding.inflate(getLayoutInflater());
050      binding.signIn.setOnClickListener((v) -> viewModel.startSignIn(launcher));
051      setContentView(binding.getRoot());
052    }
053  }
054
055  private void informFailure(Throwable throwable){
056    if (throwable != null) {
057      Snackbar.make(binding.getRoot(), R.string.login_failure_message, Snackbar.LENGTH_LONG)
058          .show();
059    }
060  }
061
062}
